questions.statement: What two application modernization tools are included in the cloud pak for applications running on Openshift Container Platform (OCP)?

comments.comment: Trasnformation Advisor- Ajuda a modernizar fornecendo insigtsIBM Digital App Builder - ferramenta geradora de código, permite criar aplicações sem codificar muito - Parte do Mobile First - ajudaa modernizarIBM Application Navigator is a tool that extends the Kubernetes® console to provide the display, inspection, understanding, and navigation of applications composed of Kubernetes resources and existing middleware, such as WebSphere Application Server. - não moderniza IBM Application Navigator is a tool that extends the Kubernetes® console to provide the display, inspection, understanding, and navigation of applications composed of Kubernetes resources and existing middleware, such as WebSphere Application Server. - não modernizaIBM Integration toolkit nem é parte do PAK4AppPlatform Navigator - a simple integrated user interface spanning components. - não moderniza e é parte do PAK4I, não do PAK4App
